stinkyvicki_BoiledStonefish_description: Wrapping the stonefish in algae before boiling helps to soften up its hard, rock-like skin.
stinkyvicki_CaveBatTempura_description: Thin, crispy, and fried to perfection!
stinkyvicki_CaveGrubDumpling_description: Delicious when lightly pan-fried and served with a spicy sauce.
stinkyvicki_CheesyBatCasserole_descripti: Incredibly filling. Even just a couple bites is enough to completely satiate your appetite.
stinkyvicki_MonsterMedleyStew_descriptio: A thick, hearty stew with a dizzying aroma.
stinkyvicki_PrehistoricOmelet_descriptio: It's probably the largest and greenest omelet you've ever seen.
stinkyvicki_RoastedBug_description: Slow cooking the bug meat with root vegetables brings out a rich, deep flavor.
stinkyvicki_RockCrabHotpot_description: Succulent crab cooked in a strong, peppery broth.
stinkyvicki_SlimeEggSouffle_description: A delicate dessert with a light sulfuric taste.
stinkyvicki_SlimeJellySandwich_descripti: An oddly flavorful sandwich with an addictive texture.
stinkyvicki_SlimeTorte_description: Almost too sweet, but it has a pleasant bounciness to it.
stinkyvicki_Slimeade_description: It's a thick and frothy beverage. Make sure to add plenty of sugar!
stinkyvicki_ShadowCoffee_description: This coffee has a strange, warm spiciness to it.
